extendedInfo.description: My Boy! is a super fast emulator to run GameBoy Advance games on the broadest range of Android devices, from very low-end phones to modern tablets. It does more than just emulating the full system. Thanks to the save state system, you can save progress at any time and return back to it instantly. And while enabling fast-forward in game, you can quickly skip the long boring intros/dialogs in RPGs.*** You CAN link up two different games, and it is easy! Refer to instructions on our website.*** CHEATS ACTUALLY WORK! Please refer to the FAQ on our website.â¢ Fastest emulation. Easily get to 60 FPS without frame skips on medium-end devices.â¢ Excellent game compatibility. Run nearly all games without a problem.â¢ Saves your battery as much as possible.â¢ Link cable emulation either on the same device, or across devices over Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, running at decent speed.â¢ Gyroscope/tilt/solar sensor and rumble emulation through your Android's hardware sensors and vibrator!â¢ Enter multilined GameShark/ActionReplay/CodeBreaker cheat codes and enable/disable them on the fly while the game is running.â¢ High-level BIOS emulation. No BIOS file needed.â¢ IPS/UPS ROM patchingâ¢ OpenGL rendering backend, as well as normal rendering on devices without a GPU.â¢ Fast-forward to skip long stories, as well as slow down games to get past a level you cannot in normal speed.â¢ Save games at any time with screenshotâ¢ On-screen keypad (multi-touch requires Android 2.0 or later), as well as shortcut buttons such as load/save. â¢ A very powerful screen layout editor, with which you can define the position and size for each of the on-screen controls, as well as for the game video.â¢ External controllers support, through either the Android native way or input method.â¢ Well-designed user interface. Seamlessly integrated with the latest Android.â¢ Create and switch to different screen-layout and key-mapping profiles.â¢ Create shortcuts to easily launch your favorite games from your desktop.No games are included in this app and you need to obtain yours in a legal way. Place them onto your SD card, and browse to them from within the app.LEGAL: This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Nintendo Corporation, its affiliates or subsidiaries.*** Unlike many others, we are the actual core developers. Your reported bugs will most likely get fixed very soon!

reviews.title: Yep
reviews.comment: Everytime I do the link or anything on pokemon fire red it freezes.   Everytime.  Samsung Note 2.   Whats up with this?  Ill rate higher if you can tell me whats up?   Even when I dont link it freezes up.  Wtf?
reviews.author: Caleb Estes

reviews.title: Glitching and crashing
reviews.comment: So I\'ve used a few cheats now anytime I open my TM case and try to use any TM\'s or HM\'s it glitches out, freezes and crashes. Help?
reviews.author: jordan Russell

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I love this app thats why i bought it i love the fact i can link up with someone or another one of my games you should make a gbc too or somehow allow me to play gbc files on this...either way thanks you make my day
reviews.author: Chris Moore

reviews.title: One question
reviews.comment: Ummm in firered I warped to navel island, and invisible walls trapped me in and I can\'t get out. Suggestions?
reviews.author: James Eberly

reviews.title: Yay
reviews.comment: No problems at all, playing pokemon and mario games from the past is just great
reviews.author: Eric Packer

reviews.title: Free version great
reviews.comment: I tried the free version and it was great (I have not patched it to the last patch) so I decided to buy the app and downloaded it and it wont load any of the gba games that the demo version did. Dissapointed that the free version is currently working better than the bought version. Hope it is  fixed soon!
reviews.author: Kristen Brookes

reviews.comment: best but
reviews.author: Juan vazquez

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love that I bought this app best purchase so far
reviews.author: Kendall Lilly

reviews.title: Excellent Buy for my Atrix
reviews.comment: This is the best running emulator I\'ve used on my phone, and the customized button layout allows me to play games Feasibly without having to try impossible button-holding combinations. Haven\'t had any problems with a ROM yet, but I do Not use cheats, out of principle.
reviews.author: Jack Black

reviews.title: The link
reviews.comment: I love the link this is the best emulator out there keep up with the updates
reviews.author: Ben Loader

reviews.title: Great Emulator!
reviews.comment: Best way to play Kirby on the go! Very fast and easy 60FPS! Glad I paid. The only real emulator on the market! But it needs more multiplayer updates. The remote link has MANY issues. Like random frames drop and all that. So after thats fix then 10000 stars! Reply: I have 30MB/S internet and not alot of people were on. So connection is no issue. But if you can focus a bit more on remote play it will be appreciated! Thanks! Also quick replys are always nice.
reviews.author: Matthew Nolan

reviews.title: System link??
reviews.comment: I wanna catch em all by system link would be awsome via wifi direct, nfc, bluetooth something
reviews.author: Rodrigo Flores

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Definitely the best emulator for gba out there
reviews.author: Ryan Foster

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: 5 star when all cheats work
reviews.author: Steven Fernandes

reviews.title: Help please!
reviews.comment: First off,  very good emulator.  I love it :D!  Runs  Smoothly and never crashes.  But I have been playing Pokemon light Platinum and I am pretty far.  But whenever I battle this one girl I have to battle,  the game freezes and I have to delete the app and reinstall it.  Help?
reviews.author: Casey Greer

reviews.title: Freakin great
reviews.comment: I dont know what these people are complaining about but this app works great. Love it. Keep up the excellent work :)
reviews.author: Cody Dakota

reviews.title: My Boy!
reviews.comment: This emulator is the best GBA emulator on the Android market because its the only emulator that could make you link with other people (E.g Pokemon trading). The only thing I want in this emulator is that if there was an option to use the GBA Wireless Adapter (that should be built in). This app is awesome and this GBA emulator really stands out from the others and is very unique in every way possible. Thank You for making such an awesome emulator. :) <3  Ps. Let there be a cheat book in the app, that has Game shark and Action Replay codes built in please! :)
reviews.author: Gianfranco La Rotta

reviews.title: Better than PC emulators!
reviews.comment: This is one of the best emulators I\'ve ever used, and that\'s saying a lot, because its a MOBILE emulator! Runs every game I\'ve thrown at it with near zero slowdown or lag. My personal best purchase on the Play store!
reviews.author: Patrick Reginelli

reviews.title: Paid money for nothing
reviews.comment: Best thing ever until all of a, sudden constant freezing on leaf green for no reason
reviews.author: Michael Buckner

reviews.title: Perfect app
reviews.comment: I have never had a single issue with this app. Works flawlessly every single time. Cheat codes work perfectly as well. We asked for gyroscope and they added it. Truely one of the best apps out there. Buy it.
reviews.author: Christian Brown
